SELECT T.product_id as productId, T.product_name as title, T.current_price/10000 AS currentPrice, T.sold_out as soldOut, T.home_pic_url as productPicUrl, DATE_FORMAT( T.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as endDate FROM rqb_auction_product_info T where T.is_shelves='yes'
AND T.product_Type in (${productType})
AND T.auction in (${auction})
AND T.location in (${location})
AND T.buy_Type in (${buyType})
AND T.auction_Status in (${auctionStatus})
order by t.sold_out asc,T.create_date desc
order by t.sold_out asc,T.current_price desc
order by t.sold_out asc,T.current_price asc
order by t.sold_out asc,T.create_date desc
order by t.sold_out asc
LIMIT #{page},10

SELECT T.product_id AS productId, T.product_name AS title, T.pic_url as productPicList, get_city_name(T.location) AS location, T.current_price/10000 AS currentPrice, DATE_FORMAT(T.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS endDate, T.raise_price AS raisePrices, T.guarantee_price AS guaranteePrice, T.evaluate_price AS evaluatePrices, T.start_price AS startPrice, T.auction_cycle AS auctionCycle, T.term, T.delayed_term AS delayTerm, T.auction_type AS auctionType, T.preferred_purchaser AS preferredPurchaser, T.bid_rules AS bidRules, T.disposal_unit AS disposalUnit, T.consultation_method AS consultationMethod, CONCAT(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('rqb_project_url','rqb_param'),'/api/auction/product/bidAnnouncement/v1.0','?productId=',T.product_id) as bidAnnouncement, CONCAT(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('rqb_project_url','rqb_param'),'/api/auction/product/introductionSubjectMatter/v1.0','?productId=',T.product_id) as introductionSubjectMatter, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM rqb_auction_apply t WHERE t.product_id = #{productId}) as reservationRecord, CASE WHEN T.sold_out = 'yes' THEN 'over' WHEN canApply = 'no' THEN 'process' ELSE 'init' END AS applyStatus FROM rqb_auction_product_info T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aa.product_id, CASE WHEN aa.apply_status = 'success' OR apply_status = 'process' THEN 'no' ELSE 'yes' END AS canApply FROM rqb_auction_apply aa WHERE aa.user_id = #{userId} AND aa.product_id = #{productId} order by aa.id desc limit 0,1 ) AS aply ON t.product_id = aply.product_id where t.product_id=#{productId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM rqb_auction_apply aa WHERE aa.user_id = #{userId} AND aa.product_id = #{productId} and aa.apply_status in ('success','process')
SELECT m.real_name AS realName, m.indentity_no AS idNo, m.phone AS phone FROM wj_user_info m WHERE m.id = #{userId}
